Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights close termini choose plan catch train venice 25 minutes walk termini medium size clean toilets clean staffs pretty friendly speak workable english rent 65 euro night included breakfast croissant cereal coffee close underground station tram bus routes supermarket nearby budget recommend hotel
